inclusion.criterion: Admission for acute decompensated heart failure
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other etiologies of fluid overload different from heart failure
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes, is over 18 years old, and presents with acute decompensated heart failure. However, he does not meet the criteria for admission due to other etiologies of fluid overload different from heart failure.
